title: GD i need your help with a computer problem ):
body:
So i built my rig this year and its not a bad one. i play Cod AW on ultra settings as well as titanfall and other games. problem is when i play league ill get in a match and ill start at around 200 fps drop or ad 10. as the game goes on and im in laning sometimes the fps can drop as low as 30. I have no idea what i causing this i checked if my cpu is over heating as im O.C it by nearly .8ghz  but nope its at a steady 40c. next i thought it could be a graphics issue but again temps are fine and it plays other games fine.  Can anyone maybe suggest something i could do? league is the one game i play the most and yet its the only game that i get this severe lag on. thanks in advance ):

My rig:
AMD FX-8320 Vishera 8-Core 3.5GHz (oc to 4.2)
EVGA GeForce GTX 660 SUPERCLOCKED 2048MB
Patriot Viper Xtreme 8GB Desktop Module Kit - DDR3, 2 x 4GB, 1600MHz
ASUS M5A78L-M LX PLUS AMD 760G Motherboard
Seagate Desktop 2 TB Solid State Hybrid Drive SATA 6 GB with NCQ 64 MB
Cooler Master Seidon 120V â€“ Compact All-In-One CPU Liquid Water Cooling System
